original_title: Heath Franklin's Chopper - Harden the F#ck Up Australia
overview: Starring Heath Franklin as Chopper and Mini-Chopper as Mini-Chopper from TVs The Ronnie Johns Half Hour Sometimes life seems a bit tough, and you just feel like finding a quiet corner and having a cry. Well it's times like these that Chopper thinks you should take off your skirt, grow a moustache and harden the f**k up.
title: Heath Franklin's Chopper - Harden the F#ck Up Australia
